title: Road to recovery: Shedding new light on the role of cycling
content:
Nearly a year ago Ben Gardner was struck by a car on the streets of London. After a long and intensive recovery process, he’s back on the bike and able to reflect on the experience, shedding light on the new role cycling plays in his life and his new found love for our sport and community as the meaning of cycling evolves for him.
